text: @clay_reece @DanielNewman The key word is well-regulated. A bunch of white thugs trying to effect change through fear is not a well-regulated protest. Nor is protesting the lack of ability to go to a bar or a hair salon during a pandemic an exercise of freedom. It is narcissistic terrorism.
